type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolvableDependencies
type.description: * A set of {@link Dependency} objects which can be resolved to a set of {@code File} instances.

method.name: afterResolve
method.description: * Adds an action to be executed after the dependencies of this set have been resolved. * * @param action The action to execute.

method.name: afterResolve
method.description: * Adds an action to be executed after the dependencies of this set have been resolved. * * @param action The action to execute.

method.name: beforeResolve
method.description: * Adds an action to be executed before the dependencies in this set are resolved. * * @param action The action to execute.

method.name: beforeResolve
method.description: * Adds an action to be executed before the dependencies in this set are resolved. * * @param action The action to execute.

method.name: getDependencies
method.description: * Returns the set of dependencies which will be resolved. * * @return the dependencies. Never null.

method.name: getFiles
method.description: * Returns a {@link FileCollection} which contains the resolved set of files. The returned value is lazy, so dependency resolution is not performed until the contents of the * collection are queried. * * @return The collection. Never null.

method.name: getName
method.description: * Returns the name of this set. * * @return The name. Never null.

method.name: getPath
method.description: * Returns the path of this set. This is a unique identifier for this set. * * @return The path. Never null.

method.name: getResolutionResult
method.description: * Returns an instance of {@link org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ResolutionResult} * that gives access to the graph of the resolved dependencies. * * @return the resolution result * @since 1.3

property.name: dependencies
property.description: * Returns the set of dependencies which will be resolved. * * @return the dependencies. Never null.

property.name: files
property.description: * Returns a {@link FileCollection} which contains the resolved set of files. The returned value is lazy, so dependency resolution is not performed until the contents of the * collection are queried. * * @return The collection. Never null.

property.name: name
property.description: * Returns the name of this set. * * @return The name. Never null.

property.name: path
property.description: * Returns the path of this set. This is a unique identifier for this set. * * @return The path. Never null.

property.name: resolutionResult
property.description: * Returns an instance of {@link org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ResolutionResult} * that gives access to the graph of the resolved dependencies. * * @return the resolution result * @since 1.3
